text: Anthony Keith Villars (24 January 1952 â€“ 9 September 2020) was a Welsh footballer. He was born in Pontypool, Wales. He made three appearances for the national team in 1974. From 1971 to 1976, he played for Cardiff City F.C.. Between 1976 and 1977, he also played for Newport County A.F.C.. Villars died on 9 September 2020 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Welsh footballers
title: Tony Villars
